feature.label: Xross Tools
feature.description:
Include editor and runtime for: Xrosstools Decision Tree Xrosstools Unit Xrosstools State.
Xrosstools Decision Tree can model complex logic by a decision tree diagram. Xrosstools Unit can build system by flow diagram. Xrosstools State can model state machine and triger state transition on event.
Version Info: 1.4.0 Optimize visual effect for state machine when connecting to same node
